item.description:
Dear Boston Karaoke Meetup Members:

I am pleased to announce our next Karaoke Meetup on December 11th 2010! It's at the Courtside Restaurant and Pub in Cambridge MA again. Courtside has an excellent selection of over 20,000 songs and many large screens for viewing lyrics. Whatever kind of music you enjoy, there will be something for you.

We have the Karaoke Lounge reserved just for us from 7-9PM so please try to get there by 7PM to get the most out of this Meetup.

It is free for anyone who does not sing, so feel free to come and just listen.

Space is limited, please sign up as soon as possible.

Regards,
-Phil
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the Karaoke Lounge or call me at 617-429-6571.
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup - December 11, 2010
